metadata.name: Monday
metadata.description:
Monday is the first piece of the collection "Laundry day".

Inspired by personal experiences in the rooftop of the building where I live in Buenos Aires. 

Ever since I moved to BA I made the routine to go to the rooftop after work to watch sunsets. Most of the times I take my camera to document that magical moment. In my camera and hard drive there are hundreds of photos of clouds, the sky, iconic domes and even clothe hanging to dry, which I consider as an aesthetic reflection of our lives. 

This collection explores a form of household art through one of the most mundane daily tasks. 

"Monday" invites the viewer to have a soothing experience while watching clothe drying in the pink sunset and dancing in the evening breeze. 

A collaboration with AI combined with my pink signature style and my personal photography as reference.
